Heatmap

Function Keywords:

x::AbstractVector
y::AbstractVector
group::AbstractVector

Heatmap

n = 30
x = Array(Int, n^2)
y = Array(Int, n^2)
color = Array(Int, n^2)
t = 0
for i in 1:n
    for j in 1:n
        t += 1
        x[t] = i
        y[t] = j
        color[t] = Int(rand() > 0.5)
    end
end

heatmap(x = x, y = y, group = color)
